评论详情: For a lightweight sweatshirt this is great.  It's got the feel of a good long-sleeved t-shirt.  I typically wear an XL, or an XXL for a slightly oversized fit.  This shirt is bought an XL and it is a bit larger than most XLs.  It is a nice oversized fit though, and is comfy.  It is long enough in back to cover my tush.  I'd wear with leggings.  The quality seems ok.  The seams on the arms and sides are a bit odd, but not terrible.  The color is nice.  Matches how it looked online.

I can never say enough about this shop. Amazing quality, style and fit. Absolutely love them. So comfy. I get more compliments on their clothing than anything I’ve ever worn. I do wait for sales as pricing is high, but worth it. Never had any issues. The only thing I can critique is color representation, some of their color selections are not quite what I expected.
This is a great sweatshirt, light weight, and stylish. It is well made, though not very soft. I like the side splits and the stitching. I am 5' 107lb and the Small fit me perfectly.
Love this top it is so cute and comfy oversized, not too heavy.
Liked the color and it is warm and comfy
I have other items by this brand and they have been oversized. This fits true to size at best, maybe with a little room. Size up if you want a true oversized look.

I love this sweatshirt. It’s very cozy. The only thing I wish that it had is pockets but otherwise it’s a great sweatshirt. I ordered a large and it fit loose like the picture. I’ve ordered other shirts from this company before and I have had no complaints!

I’ve really liked all of the clothing I’ve purchased from this company. They’re soft and durable products. This shirt was a bit more of a bubblegum pink than it shows but it’s not unflattering. It’s a little oversized but not baggy.

We bought this as a birthday gift for my daughter. It looks lovely, soft and flowie. It is soft but not as flowie and has tattered edges, by design. I didn't notice that in the images. The top is light enough that she doesn't feel too hot, and the garment us very soft to the touch.  The seams are on the outside, not the inside which to me, takes away from the type of top it was meant to be. So on that note, I do not believe it is a great price for the item it actually is, IMHO

I ended up returning the first size and color I purchased to get a large in this dusty blue color. I read reviews that said size down, I'm 5'9" and 175 lbs and the medium was very fitted, especially over my hips. I usually wear a 10/12 in pants. I wanted an oversized fit/look so I went with large which is usually what size I order in other tops. The color is perfectly soft and muted and looks great with leggings and ankle Ugg's. Love it!

I’m postpartum and have to compensate for larger breasts at the moment. I am 5’0” and currently about 160. I purchased a large and could have gotten away with a medium I believe. Exterior looks like a sweatshirt but inside isn’t sweatshirt material. It’s more like a thicker tshirt, but comfortable nonetheless. I purchased the burnt orange color and want more in other colors! Definitely a great Amazon find!

It’s a pretty good sweatshirt; sort of cotton and polyester like. The bottom band is a little odd how it lies and not connected on the sides. Im a size medium but I ordered the L to have it a bit bigger fitting, but I believe that it maybe designed to be larger in sizing and the fit. Should have ordered a medium and it would have probably worked out as oversized. Im 5’9” and 150lbs for reference.

I really like this shirt and it’s pretty TTS . Maybe a little pinch smaller than TTS but acceptable.  The sleeves could be a little longer though .  It was like that even before I washed the shirt .  I just push up the sleeves and no one even can tell

The pink is more of a peach color. The top just didn’t fit right and the cut out on the sides of the shirt were just not in a good location. The quality wasn’t bad for the price. I’m tall with athletic build but just wasn’t a good fit overall.  Don’t get me wrong if I was only wearing this around the house it would be fine but not out in public.
Wife liked the idea of this, but didn’t 100% like the fit. Felt like good quality, but maybe the design just wasn’t her speed

I returned this gray sweatshirt.  It wasn't the same high quality that I was used to getting from Anrabess.  I was disappointed.  The fit was awkward and did not look like the model, as most other Anrabess clothes have fit on me.  The shirt was thin.  I returned it.
This is my new favorite sweater.  Perfect amount of warmth for indoors. It's so cozy.  The material is nice and thick without being bulky. The quality is fantastic. I want to live in this shirt.
It is a nice sweatshirt . True to size
This is a light weight Sweatshirt if it’s really cold, I wear a little tee under it, but I love it
Cute, comfortable and gets lots of compliments
I have absolutely lovedthis sweatshirt! Every time I wear it, I get tons of compliments. It is warm and comfortable and looks great with jeans or leggings.
Great product! Material, quality, fit. My new favorite!

I love the color and quality of this sweatshirt. It's nice and heavy and will be perfect for the winter weather that I live in. My only issue was how big it was. I ordered an XXL because that's what I tend to wear when I want something baggy, but it swallowed me up. I usually wear a XL or XXL or size 16 or 18.

This is a nice shirt. I like the cut of it and it looks elevated. I have two slight issues with it. One is the color is more beige/khaki than the color shown on the screen. I wanted it to have the dark khaki/gray shade as shown. Also, I am somewhat long in the torso, but I am very short at 5 foot. It goes under my butt in the back, but only barely. I would like just a little more length on it. Anyone tall at all would probably find it a bit short.  Very comfy and cute overall with some tweaks.
It a little big . But simple light weight. More lounge then outfit
I really like this, my only complaint is that I should have sized down.
This sweatshirt is so comfortable and cuter than a regular sweatshirt that I have bought two colors and I’m thinking about buying a third. Maybe even a fourth. Lol I love the neckline.

Sweatshirt is real comfortable, runs big. The only thing I wished  was that the material would be softer.  Other than that I love it.  I got a lot of compliments on the color.  This is super warm, so it's great for the late fall and winter.

Absolutely love this oversized sweatshirt. It is warm, comfortable, and breathable. Since it is a Tunic, it runs large, so order a size smaller than you normally wear. I loved it so much, that I purchase two more in grey and white.
Fits well. Soft and breathable. Did not shrink with washing!! I am often asked for the link!!! Super cute must have!!
Love it
Good bum coverage, oversized. Love it!!
Great fit! Love it, I never give reviews, but would highly recommend
I love the material thickness and the fit. This looks cute with yoga pants.  I loved this one so much, I bought one in another color.
Nice, Great Job,  comfortable!
Very comfortable
It is lightweight and great for cooler spring/summer/fall days. I like to wear a long sleeved tshirt under it. Very comfortable.
This is a true sweatshirt material, not fake like some tunics.  Not lined, nice and thin.  Great oversized style
Love this shirt-perfect coverage for leggings. Material is a thicker tshirt material, so no see thru. Would buy again!
Bought this sweatshirt in two colors. Love the over sized style, neck opening, waistband, and weight. Not too hot or bulky.
Nice material keeps me warm love it
Love this sweatshirt!! Fits great and lightweight

Super thin material and guessing it’s not going to hold up very well in the wash. That being said it looks exactly as pictured and has a nice drape to it. I ordered whatever size Amazon recommended and it’s a nice relaxed fit.
So very cute and had to order more in different colors.  Amazing with leggings and just the perfect length to cover my bum!  I purchased a med and I'm between size 6-8.

So I always like to find a sweatshirt with an unique neckline. I really like this one. Lately, everything that states "Oversized" on Amazon has been a sloppy mess on me when ordering my normal size L. So, I ordered this in M, and it is perfectly sized even after going through the washer and dryer. I am 5'6 and 150 pounds. I cannot say that I am in love with the 2 length bottom hem, but I did know that when ordering. Overall, it is a keeper in my opinion.
Exactly as described...very pleased with softness and fit
Roomy, comfy, flattering.

Really perfect weight for Fall and Spring, no fleece on the inside, but soft.  Like the styling as well.  It was a real debate about size.  It’s oversized to begin with and I did not want to be swimming in it, I got a Medium and glad I did.  I am currently sitting at 165, and about a B/C cup and I definitely think the Large would have been too big.
I am pleasantly surprised by the Consistency in this brand as far as sizing and quality of product definitely one of my go to very happy with this shirt.
Super cute! I love it.

While this sweatshirt is comfortable and I love the color and the addition of the 'V' neck, I'm disappointed that it doesn't have the slit at the lower hem like the original version. It also doesn't seem quite as oversized as the original.

It's kinda weird the material is very heavy but not very flatering.. I ended up returning it ... the quality is good but the fit is way to big definitely size down just couldn't see paying that price for something I didn't love ...  looks like your wearing a sack
I wear this with leggings or jeans.
Size fit true to size. Thinner than I thought it would be.
Love the fit and fabric
The cutout of the collar makes this sweatshirt so much better!
Quality is fine. As indicated it is oversized but is very comfortable.
Not super flattering on a 5’4” granny but it is comfy

Love the colors but it’s not that soft of a material and it’s not long enough for me (I’m 5’10 and it doesn’t cover my butt) and it’s too puffy in the arms. It’s a much boxier fit than the photos make it seem.

I got this sweatshirt to wear around the house with my favorite patchwork flannel pant. Chose the dark green color. Disliked the fabric right away, it was polyester and felt unpleasantly sleek on skin. The seams in front were too wide and strange-looking. In my opinion, the sweatshirt’s price does not correspond to its quality at all. Retuned it.

评论概述: It’s a little big for me
评论详情: Like it. Always looks better in the picture
Fits really odd. Runs smaller than expected as well.
Cute style, horrible material! Like wearing a thick plastic bag. Had to wash and iron before I wore it. Should have sent back.
The material doesn't feel good on skin, a few seams are off and it's too small. This piece is going to charity. Waste of miney
This is a sweatshirt. Not at all what I expected
Poor quality super itchy.

Overall this is a great, oversized top for the price.  Color and look were as pictured.  The material isn’t super soft, but ok for the price.  I wish the V neck was a little lower- felt more like a U.  I’m 5’3”, 140 lbs and got a small.
Nothing to rave about. Very light for warmer days. The yellow is really more tan, not yellow.
Size up. It didn’t fit exactly as I had hoped. I gifted it to my daughter who is smaller than me.
This is my favorite sweatshirt. Perfect weight, not too thick or too thin. I love how it lays. Covers the booty. Cute cut.

评论概述: It is soft,  oversized,  but not in a tacky way,  wearing it is alot of fun
评论详情: needs an attached hood
It is cute...soft and different!♡♡♡ good value...washes wrll!!!
I love this sweatshirt. The sizing is perfect and I love the cut. The material is so soft and the color is true to the photo! I will be ordering more colors!
Ordered a Medium and its way way too big.

This review is for the ANRABESS Womens Oversized Sweatshirt V Neck B0D5CRQJFJ  My wife likes the style and the shirt is very comfortable. She likes longer shirts to wear with leggings. The size fits as expected and the color (gray) matched the photos. Nice and warm shirt for fall weather.
This is a nice sweatshirt but, isn’t as long as pictured in the advertisement.  It’s roomy, but too short. My wife is disappointed.
I love the cut out in the neck.  The length is perfect for leggings but not too bulky for jeans.
Love this lightweight pullover! Great for leggings and a comfy fit! Just the right outfit addition for early fall!
Great sweatshirt. Love the v neck!
This sweater is so nice and the neutral color is beautiful.  It is made so nicely. I will wear this with leggings a lot this fall and winter.

This is a nice sweatshirt. The color is beautiful. I like that it's not lined in fleece, keeps it lightweight and wearable for Spring and Fall. In cooler weather it can be layered over an undershirt. It's tunic length so plenty of material to CYA. The price is very reasonable.

评论概述: Soft, Cozy, and Perfect for Fall – Love It!
评论详情: I am so impressed with this oversized V-neck sweatshirt! The weight and softness of the fabric are amazing, making it the perfect cozy piece for fall. The quality is outstanding; it feels durable yet super comfortable, and the longer back hem adds a stylish touch that sets it apart from other sweatshirts. It pairs effortlessly with jeans or leggings, and the patchwork design gives it a trendy vibe that’s great for any casual occasion. I can’t wait to wear it all season long. Bring on the cool weather—this sweatshirt is ready!

This tunic-style sweatshirt is just right. Oversized, with a high-low hem, it's simple yet fashionable. My favorite part is the V-neck -- it's hard to find a snuggly soft warm sweatshirt that isn't crew-necked. I much prefer this style, no matter the weather.  This will be perfect for fall. It will pair well with leggings or jeans -- and for now, during summer, it's great over shorts at night at the beach. It looks good, feels good, and is easy-care. I'm really pleased with it and look forward to wearing it on cool nights.
